channel.title: Charts on Aspose.Cells Product Family
channel.description: Recent content in Charts on Aspose.Cells Product Family

item.title: Creating and Customizing Charts
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Possible Usage Scenarios 2 Pyramid Chart 3 Line Chart 4 Bubble Chart 5 Creating Custom Charts | Possible Usage Scenarios A chart is a visual display of information. Aspose.Cells allows developers to visualize information in charts just as Microsoft Excel does. Presenting information in charts is always helpful to decision-makers for making quick and timely decisions.

item.title: Read and Manipulate Excel 2016 Charts
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Possible Usage Scenarios 2 Read and Manipulate Excel 2016 Charts 3 Sample Code 4 Console Output | Possible Usage Scenarios Aspose.Cells supports the reading and manipulation of Microsoft Excel 2016 charts which are not present in Microsoft Excel 2013 or earlier versions. Read and Manipulate Excel 2016 Charts The following sample code loads the sample Excel file which contains Excel 2016 charts in the first worksheet.

item.title: Chart Rendering
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Creating Charts 2 Rendering Charts 2.1 Rendering Charts to Images 2.2 Rendering Chart to PDF 3 Supported Chart Types for Rendering | Creating Charts Aspose.Cells APIs support to create a verity of Excel charts as detailed under the topicÂ Creating & Customizing Excel Charts. In order to demonstrate the usage of Aspose.Cells APIs to render the charts in image & PDF format, we will create a chart of type Column as per following snippet.
